weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_Phy_Resonance_Overseas_des: Physical Resonance: Increase physical ATK by 15% and physical resistance by 25%. Activate by equipping 2 or more physical-damage weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level0_des: Every 10 combos (a single attack that hits multiple targets counts as 1 attack, successful attacks made within 5 seconds count as combos) grant a stack of the following buff: Increase final damage dealt by 5% for 25 seconds (stack up to 3 times, combos made after reaching 3 stacks will refresh the buff's duration).
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level1_DamageUp_des: Increase damage dealt by ???% for ??? seconds. The effect can be stacked up to 3 times for a maximum of 1 stack per skill use.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level1_des: After hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, grant 1 stack of the following buff: Increase damage dealt by ???% for ??? seconds, stacking up to 3 times for a maximum of 1 stack per skill use.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level3_BeDamageUp_des: Increase incoming physical damage and shatter for physical weapons by ???% for ??? seconds. Stack up to 1 time.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level3_des: When hitting a target with a skill or discharge skill, apply 1 stack of War Wounds to the target: Increase incoming physical damage and shatter from physical weapons by ???% for ??? seconds. Stack up to 1 time.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level5_OS_des: Hitting targets with skills or discharge skills grants damage boost, which increases all damage by 20% for 25 seconds. This effect does not stack.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level5_SkillDamageUp_O: Increase skill damage by 20% for 25 seconds.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level5_SkillDamageUp_d: Increase skill damage of all weapons by ???% for ??? seconds.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level5_des: Hitting targets with skills or discharge skills grants Skill Damage Boost, which increases all weapon skill damage by ???% for ??? seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level6_BeDamageUp_des: Increase incoming physical damage and shatter from physical weapons by ???% for ??? seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.
weapon.Buff_SwordPhy_SSR_Level6_des: Skills hitting the same target no longer have reduced damage. After using Guren Blade's skills or discharge skill, all targets with War Wounds within 8 meters gain another 1 stack of War Wounds.
